      • getFaction

        public Faction getFaction()
        Description copied from interface: Claim
        Claims only exist if they are owned by a Faction. If an area is the Wilderness, it does not have a set Faction and therefore it can't be a claim.
        Specified by:

      • getOwners

        public Collection<User> getOwners()
        Description copied from interface: Claim
        All users who have ownership of the Claim. If the Server does not have the option to allow owners of a Claim then this method will always return null.
        Specified by:
        getOwners in interface Claim
        Returns:
        the Claim owners.

      • isWithin

        public boolean isWithin(User user)
        Description copied from interface: Claim
        Checks whether or not the given User is within this Claim. If the User is offline this method will always return false.
        Specified by:
        isWithin in interface Claim
        Parameters:
        user - the User to check.
        Returns:
        true if the User is within the Claim.

      • getCenter

        public LazyLocation getCenter()
        Description copied from interface: Claim
        Get the geometric center of the Claim. Important to note that this will most likely not be a whole number as it gets the exact number of the center.
